parameters.name: max_results
parameters.description: Maximum number of volumes to return (page length).

parameters.name: page_token
parameters.description: Opaque token returned by a previous request. It must be included in the request to retrieve the next page of results (pagination).

parameters.name: include_browse
parameters.description: Whether to include volumes in the response for which the principal can only access selective metadata for

200.description: The volume list was successfully retrieved

get.description: Gets an array of volumes for the current metastore under the parent catalog and schema.
